title: Peugeot Partner
description: Camper van, year 2014 re-registered, 2nd driver. Previous maintenance •Newly changed tires pre-sale •Shock absorbers and couplings •Particulate filter in December 2023 •ITV 2024 ACCESSORIES: •Cruising speed •Integrated railing + roof bars for tent • “Domingocamper” brand tent, model DMG135, capacity for 2 people and a child or pet + advance (pvp: €1,350) •Tinted windows, approval certificate •Hitch ball •Folding bed furniture 105X190 (possibility of placing with the 5 seats) + memory foam mattress •9-layer thermal blinds • 7' LCD touch screen with bluetooth.
